wikipedia_page.main: Sir Sacheverell Reresby Sitwell, 6th Baronet  (; 15 November 1897 – 1 October 1988) was an English writer, best known as an art critic, music critic (his books on Mozart, Liszt, and Domenico Scarlatti are still consulted), and writer on architecture, particularly the baroque. Dame Edith Sitwell and Sir Osbert Sitwell were his older siblings.Sitwell produced some 50 volumes of poetry and some 50 works on art, music, architecture, and travel.
